form.IN:
Lives
je tudi oblika za 3. osebo ednine sedanjega časa od glagola‘live’; izgovarjamo jo
/l*Ivz/
.

sense.def:
Life
je lastnost, ki jo imajo ljudje, živali in rastline, ki so živi; predmeti in snovi je nimajo.

Life
so stvari, ki so žive.

One's life
je stanje, ko je nekdo živ, ali obdobje, v katerem je nekdo živ.

seg.quote: People spend their lives worrying about money.
I've had such a fascinating life.

sense.def:
Life
so tudi dogodki in izkušnje, ki jih doživljajo ljudje.

seg.quote: Life is probably harder for women.
I don't know what you want out of life.

sense.def:
Kadar je oseba ali kraj
full of life
, je poln dejavnosti in vznemirjenja.

The life of a machine, object, or substance
je obdobje, kolikor nekaj traja.

seg.quote: Using bleach shortens the life of any fabric.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj ali nekdo, ki ni bil dejaven,
comes to life
, postane dejaven.

seg.quote: Their political movement came to life again.

sense.def:
To hold on to something for dear life
pomeni nečesa se zelo trdno držati;

seg.quote: I held on to the ledge for dear life.

sense.def:
To live one's own life
pomeni živeti tako, kot želimo, brez vmešavanja drugih.

seg.quote: She was 18 after all, entitled to live her own life.

sense.def:
To take a person's life
pomeni ubiti neko usebo;

seg.quote: On the eve of his conviction, he took his own life.
